short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple sticky notes extension with download and clear options

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mini Sticky Notes: Your Digital Sticky Companion

Streamline your thoughts with Mini Sticky Note, the lightweight sticky note extension for Chrome. Perfect for busy professionals, students, and anyone who loves to jot down ideas on the fly.

Key Features:
- 📝 Instant note-taking: Type and save with a single click
- 💾 Auto-save: Never lose a thought again
- 📥 One-click download: Export notes as TXT files
- 🎨 Distraction-free interface: Clean design for focused writing
- 🔒 Privacy-focused: Your notes stay local and sync across devices

Boost your productivity and keep your ideas at your fingertips with Sticky Note. Simple, fast, and always there when inspiration strikes!
